name: AEGON N.V.
bossPosition: Head of Government & Policy Affairs for Europe
membership:
Pan-European Insurance Forum (PEIF); Chief Risk Officers’ (CRO) and Chief Finance Officers’ (CFO) Forums; Geneva Association (GA); European Financial Services Roundtable (EFR), Insurance Europe, Verbond van Verzekeraars, Institute of International Finance (IIF) 
Companies of the AEGON Group are also active in various national associations
goal:
Aegon provides insurance, pensions and asset management in over 20 countries. The company is listed on the Amsterdam and New York stock exchanges and manages more than EUR 800 billion revenue generating investments. The group has over 25.000 employees across the globe. Its main operations are in the United States where it is one of the largest insurance companies, the Netherlands where it is headquartered and in the UK where it has a strong market position in individual and group pensions. In Central and Eastern Europe, Aegon has businesses in several countries: Hungary, Poland, Romania and is also active in Turkey and Ukraine. The company also has operations in Canada, Spain, France, Ireland, Hong Kong, China, India, Indonesia, Japan, Australia, Thailand, Singapore, Mexico and Brazil.

For more information, please see: http://www.aegon.com
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
